entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
